name: 2P Death Counter
description: This mod counts when one of the player dies!

issues.info: If you find any bugs or have suggestions, please report them on the mod's GitHub page.

showCounter.name: Show Counter
showCounter.description: Show the death counter on the screen.

colorPlayer1.name: Player 1 Color
colorPlayer1.description: Color of the first player's counter.

XpositionPlayer1.name: Position X
XpositionPlayer1.description: Horizontal position of the first player's counter (0 = left, 1 = right).

YpositionPlayer1.name: Position Y
YpositionPlayer1.description: Vertical position of the first player's counter (0 = bottom, 1 = top).

colorPlayer2.name: Player 2 Color
colorPlayer2.description: Color of the second player's counter.

XpositionPlayer2.name: Position X
XpositionPlayer2.description: Horizontal position of the second player's counter (0 = left, 1 = right).

YpositionPlayer2.name: Position Y
YpositionPlayer2.description: Vertical position of the second player's counter (0 = bottom, 1 = top).
